project.name: Parts
project.description: This is a simple Teiid Designer model project that demonstrates how a view model can be used to create a virtual relational table that joins multiple physical relational tables. The project also contains a Virtual Database (VDB) which contains the project's models, and in a runtime environment, would also contain the needed connection information for the physical sources. VDBs are used by Teiid to access federated data.

fix.property: This project example requires a Teiid instance running within the JBoss EAP 5.0 or JBoss AS >= 5.1.0

project.name: Portfolio
project.shortDescription: Portfolio Web Service Project Set Example
project.description: This is a Teiid Designer model project that demonstrates how to expose any Teiid data source as a web service. The example will walk through the steps of creating the data sources, creating the VDB and generating/deploying the JbossWS-CXF web service war.

project.name: US States
project.shortDescription: US States SOAP Service Project Set Example
project.description: This is a Teiid Designer model project that demonstrates how to consume a sample SOAP service as a source of data. The example provides the sample SOAP Service and a Teiid Designer project set that executes the service and transforms the responses to relational results.

fix.property: This project example requires a Teiid instance running within the JBoss EAP 5.0
